properties.description: to read the input file from ADLS container

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		{ firstname} as string,
		{ lastname} as string,
		active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> sourceadls
sourceadls select(mapColumn(
		cust_id = id,
		first_name = { firstname},
		last_name = { lastname},
		is_active = active
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(enrollment_date = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkparquet
